title: Anyone ever been Maokai and Vi'd?
body: Literally made it like 2 minion widths from where I got punched in the face before I died as Mega Gnar.

replies.body: and what does maokai have to do with vi when your using gnar?

I think the same thing happened to him when instead of Vi using her E(by default) Maokai used Arcane smash while he was "2 minion widths away".
^I think

Nah I just got like Punched in the face, snared, Arcane smashed, Assault and batteried then had sapling thrown on me and then got punched again and the snared again and then I was dead.

It was like crawling through 6 feet thick snow trying to escape that shiz.
